_header: Peter Peter prince of apostles all
Title(s): ‘A Christemasse game made by Maister Benet’
_description: Benedict [?Burgh], ‘A Christemasse game made by Maister Benet’ — twelve stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar7333.First Lines:
Petir Petir prynce of aposteles allPrimat of the chirche and
                    gouernore…
BLHar7333.Last Lines:
…Eternally in blisse for thy greete constaunceCome and reioice
                    thyne owne inheritaunce
BLHar7333.Attributed Title:
A Cristemasse game made by Maister Benet howe god almyghty seyde to his
                    apostelys and echon off them were baptiste and none knewe of othir etc. (f.
                        149vb)
